Visuals

In the following you can find various visual elements required for the Reproducible Builds visual identity.

Colors

The main Reproducible Builds color is Dark Blue. Use Light Blue as a secondary option.

Reproducible Builds

Paragraph Overpass Regular

Reproducible Builds are a set of software development practices that create an independently-verifiable path from source code to the binary code used by computers.

Code Snippet Overpass Mono 

          $('.rb-sidebar').on('click', 'a',function() {
              $('.rb-sidebar a.active').removeClass('active');
              $(this).addClass('active');
          });
